jobs_results.title: Security Analyst at Nike
jobs_results.description:
Employer Referral

Security Analyst at Nike

NIKE, Inc. does more than outfit the world's best athletes. It is a place to explore potential, obliterate boundaries and push out the edges of what can be. The company looks for people who can grow, think, dream and create. Its culture thrives by embracing diversity and rewarding imagination. The brand seeks achievers, leaders and visionaries. At Nike, it’s about each person bringing skills and passion to a challenging and constantly evolving game. Who Are We Looking For We’re looking for a Converse Security Analyst. This role is responsible for triaging requests coming into the team, tracking and managing risk, and supporting the program build-out. Being successful in this role requires operational excellence, continual process improvement and customer service. The candidate needs to possess knowledge of industry best practices, good judgment and problem-solving skills to execute Converse security operations, cyber risk management as well... as deliver on cyber security enhancements. They need to be detail-oriented, disciplined in documenting process and procedures, and adept at making good decisions under pressure and be able to quickly adapt to common security challenge. What Will You Work On If this is you, you’ll be working with Corporate Information Security - Converse Cybersecurity team and perform these key tasks: Establish Current Risk Landscape by Assessing needs and creating RACI for Converse, 3rd Party Apps, and Nike security requirements for critical vendors. Align Converse work to risk remediation by tracking, reporting and prioritizing Corporate Information Security (CIS)-Converse engagements with a focus on risk reduction Responsible for triaging requests coming into the team, tracking and managing risk, and supporting the program build-out. Who Will You Work With You will be part of the Corporate Information Security team at Nike, Inc WHAT YOU BRING Associates degree in computer science or related field, or equivalent work experience At least two years of information technology experience with one year in an information security-related role Solid knowledge and understanding of information technology systems and process Working knowledge of Information Technology and Security fundamentals Experience with Windows Server/Workstation and Mac OS is required Proven analytical, problem solving and troubleshooting skills Knowledge of information security principles and practice Experience in security incident response The ability to learn and apply new concepts quickly Strong written and oral communication skills Comfortable with interfacing with other internal or external organizations regarding security policy and standards violations, security controls failure and incident response situations Ability to balance and prioritize work Must be trustworthy in keeping sensitive data confidential One or more of the following professional certifications (Optional) Certified Information Security Professional (CISSP) Cyber Risk Information Security Certification (CRISC) Certified Information Security Auditor (CISA) Global Information Assurance Certification (GIAC) NIKE, Inc. is a growth company that looks for team members to grow with it. Nike offers a generous total rewards package, casual work environment, a diverse and inclusive culture, and an electric atmosphere for professional development. No matter the location, or the role, every Nike employee shares one galvanizing mission: To bring inspiration and innovation to every athlete* in the world. NIKE, Inc. is committed to employing a diverse workforce. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability. Show more

Original Joblink: https://sg.linkedin.com/jobs/view/security-analyst-at-nike-1983844361

jobs_results.title: Payments Technical Architect - Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Job Description :
We are looking for a strong technical architect or technical business analyst who comes from a software engineering background and experience in the payments space, specifically in the following areas:
• Payment Services Provider / PSP onboarding flows
• Payment Facilitator Onboarding and certification flows
• Payment Processing Acquiring
• Card Issuing / Scheme Onboarding (Visa, MasterCard, JCB, ...)
• Card tokenization and wallet services
• POS fleet management, rollout and certification (L2 / L3 certification)
• E-money / wallet (not crypto) architecture
• Issuer Processing
• MOTO / Virtual Terminals
• Core banking / Ledger implementations
• EMV standards / ISO8583

This is an excellent opportunity for an ambitious individual to come in and help shape the technical roadmap for a leading payments company. If this sounds like something that you are passionate about and aligned with, please reach out to [Confidential Information]
Please contact #ConsultantFirstname... #ConsultantSurname (Reg No. #Consultant_RegNo) at #CompanyName (Licence no. #CompanyLicenceNo

jobs_results.title: Technical Business Analyst
jobs_results.description:
• Join an established IT services company with strong history of success
• Gain expertise in wealth management
• Excellent career development opportunities

Founded by a team with over 20 years of IT experience, our client supports businesses who outsource their IT functions, with their ability in cross-application connectivity.

The Job

You will be responsible for :
• Handling all aspects of business analysis, user stories, requirements gathering, BRD, technical analysis and testing.
• Liaising closely with various business representatives, business users and development teams.
• Writing technical specifications and participating in defect fixes, change requests and/or project work
• The implementation of Avaloq wealth suite

The Profile
• You have a Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Engineering or similar filed.
• You have at least 3 years of similar experience with knowledge in wealth management
• Avaloq experience or certification will be advantageous
• You are able to work... independently as well as in a team
• You have the ability to drive discussions independently
• You are a self-driven and results focused individual
• You possess effective communication skills

Ref: 53610993

jobs_results.title: Business Analyst (26068)
jobs_results.description:
Business Analyst (26068)

Credit Suisse is a leading global wealth manager with strong investment banking capabilities. Headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland, we have a global reach with operations in about 50 countries and employ more than 45,000 people from over 150 different nations. Embodying entrepreneurial spirit, Credit Suisse delivers holistic financial solutions to our clients, including innovative products and specially tailored advice. Striving for quality and excellence in our work, we recognize and reward extraordinary performance among our employees, provide wide-ranging training and development opportunities, and benefit from a diverse range of perspectives to create value for our clients, shareholders and communities. We are Credit Suisse.

We Offer
We are looking for a business analyst to join our high-profile and successful team building the strategic payments systems for global business processes across the bank.
As a senior member in the team you will be responsible... for:
• Driving requirements analysis across multiple programs.
• Collaborating within a project team to deliver technology solutions for solving business problems.
• Managing requirements backlog, prioritization, estimations and planning as well as User Acceptance Testing and supporting business adoption.
Your future colleagues
This role is within the Group CTO, End User Services Division. End User Support Services (EUSS) is a Global organization, and we are responsible for providing a High Touch desktop support team, who provides customer focused, responsive domain expertise across all banking divisions, Executives, Board of Directors, Global Markets Investment Banking, IBCM and Wealth Management. Also providing a Site Operations team which specialize & are responsible for Hardware Support, Managed Printer Services, Desktop Cabling, Meeting room support and Mobile Voice Recording support.
We are a group with in Credit Suisse IT, who believe in work hard and mean time fun loving culture people. While working on the client requirements and bringing value for business, also we enrich our working experience by participating in various organizational activities like CSR initiative, fun activities, cross departmental connects etc.
The group has a right mix of younger talents and experienced people, which will give an opportunity learn while working, meantime open for new ideas. In total, we believe in building value while we work both to our lives as well as to customer
The department values Diversity and Inclusion (D&I) and is committed to realizing the firm's D&I ambition which is an integral part of our global cultural values

You Offer

A successful candidate will have:
• Strong educational background with (preferably) a degree in MBA/PGDBM/B.Tech. Relevant certification like CFA, FRM or CBAP would be an advantage
• More than 8 years of relevant business analysis experience within banking and financial services, preferably in Credit Risk or Private Banking or wealth management area
• Proficient in liaising with multiple partners, conducting requirement analysis workshops and translating requirements into Business Requirement Documents / user stories and Functional Specification Documents.
• Proficient in Partner's engagement, co-ordination and management, change requests and production issue handling, Application training, test & defect management (SIT, UAT).
• Good domain and system knowledge in Payments domain to turn customer needs into workable technology outcomes.
• Outstanding analytical and problem solving skills. Familiar with Agile, managing & prioritizing requirement backlog
• Strong hand in writing functional specifications and user stories with the usage of share point, Confluence, Visio etc.
• Working knowledge of UI prototyping tools, with a good sense of user experience and user journey for any application design is desirable.
• Has experience of independently handling end to end delivery of complex projects
• Working across multiple time zone, Self-driven, highly motivated and detail-oriented. Has the ability to multitask while managing pressure situations.
• Effective time management - able to work under-pressure and meet deadlines for both project related and non-project related tasks.
• A desire to continuously learn new techniques/ technologies and bring innovative ideas into the team. Desirable:
• Expertise in Payment Domain with exposure to SWIFT MT, MX/ISO20022 formats messages, working of various clearing systems, cross-border payments, etc.
• Good knowledge of various aspects of International Payment Processing and SWIFT Message types 101, 103, 202, 210, 900, 910, 199, 191, 192, 196, 204, 205 etc.
• Good knowledge of APIs, Kafka, Sanctions, Risk filter & Payment security. Understands the value of diversity in the workplace and is dedicated to fostering an inclusive culture in all aspects of working life so that people from all backgrounds receive equal treatment, realize their full potential and can bring their full, authentic selves to work

Credit Suisse is an equal opportunity employer. Welcoming diversity gives us a competitive advantage in the global marketplace and drives our success

jobs_results.title: Systems Analyst (Global Service Incident Manager - AP)
Data Analyst (6 Months Contract) (No Exp Welcome) (IMMD) (Luxury Retail MNC)
jobs_results.description:
• Data Science Certification
• No Exp Welcome
• Data Storytelling Exp
• 6 Months Contract Exp – IMMD Role
Job Scope:
• Assist markets in their decision-making process by generating insights from client datas for studies & analysis
• Identify growth opportunities, formulate action plans & measure regional performance through KPI tracking
• Monitor generation of automated lists & reporting
• Ensure accuracy of database
• Drive new Business Intelligence projects launch
• EDM campaign management support
• Any other ad-hoc duties as assigned
Requirements:
• Possess a Diploma in Business or relevant
• Possess certification in Data Science will be highly favored
• Experience in consumer insights / market intelligence function is advantageous
• Prior experience from Retail / FMCG industry will be highly favored
• Proficiency in Salesforce, Qlikview, Excel & Powerpoint
• Strong attention to details & accuracy
• Good communications & interpersonal skills
• Able to commit for 6 months
To apply... please click on the APPLY NOW button or email your resume to search70@searchindex.com.sg with the following details inside your resume for faster processing:
• Reason for leaving each past & current employment
• Salary drawn for each past & current employment
• Expected Salary
• Earliest availability date
We regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified. By submitting any application or résumé to us, you will be deemed to have agreed and consented to us collecting, using, retaining and disclosing your personal information to prospective employers for their consideration

jobs_results.title: IT Risk & Control Analyst
Analyst, EUC & Svc Desk
jobs_results.description:
NCS is a leading information and communications technology (ICT) and communications engineering services provider across the Asia-Pacific region. We are headquartered in Singapore and a wholly owned subsidiary of the Singtel Group. We have in-depth domain knowledge and unique capabilities that create business value for customers. We offer a broad range of services, including consulting, systems development and integration, business process outsourcing, infrastructure management and solutions, and technology solutions.

As a Analyst, EUC & Service Desk, the broad area of your job responsibilities will cover the following:
• Leading a team of End User Computing engineers in providing end user computing services, including handling IT issues
• Supporting areas of Walk-in EUC Support Centre / Premium User Support / On-site EUC Support / Software Packaging
• Leading the team in providing seamless support to project users and working closely with Service Delivery Manager
• Ensure that the... team meets its stipulated business Service Level Agreements
• Monitor and track all incidents, service requests closely to completion and fine tune processes to achieve maximum efficiency for the team
• Feedback performance gap to Manager and determine training needs to bridge gaps of team members
• Perform technical escalation to other teams or 3rd party vendors (when required)
• Be the next level of technical escalation for all team members
• Familiar with various Endpoint Infrastructure technology and processes

Ideal candidate should possess the following:
• Diploma / Degree in equivalent discipline
• Having 3 - 5 Years of experience in IT Support and 2-3 years of experience in leading a team
• Good to have ITIL certification, project and people management skillsets
• Relevant experience in SCCM infrastructure, deployment of Software packages and scripting
• Proficient in as SCCM architecture, Mcafee endpoint security and deployment applications
• Able to working under fast paced environment

jobs_results.title: Global Corporate Finance Operations Researcher, Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Description

Job Description :

Researcher mainly handles BRC requests with high quality output. The Researcher is certified to handle from basic to Level 2 requests. The Researcher is also expected to buddy and mentor junior staff.
Roles& Responsibilities
Responsibility
• Process research requests effectively and efficiently, selecting and utilizing the most relevant internal and external information sources
• Utilize quantitative and qualitative secondary research products
• Process the requests in a timely and cost effective manner.
• Professionally handle the tasks with value addition even when the queues are heavy

Research skills
• The Researcher is certified to handle basic research and Level 2 across modules like Market Research Level-2, Topical Level-2, Quant Level-2, Economic & Financial Lelvel-2, Sector L1 & L2.
• Works on basic research but devotes more time to intermediate to complex requests. Developing both market research and quantitative skills with the ability to... find granular information.

Customer service
• Must be client focused with a good understanding of bankers needs in terms of research quality and timeliness.
• Good communication skills and the ability to conduct reference interviews and discuss requirements with bankers.

People Development
• Researcher must be able to assist with training and buddy-ing junior bankers on basic research
• Could be a good role model for juniors. Can mentor junior staff

Knowledge &skill set
• Complex level research skills for topical 2 level. Good understanding of own sector terminology, sources, availability of information.
• Basic understanding of Investment Banking industry, familiarity with investment banking terminology, trends and frequently requested information.
• Working knowledge of all the major regional databases, product and information sources, including understanding of their contract limit and copy rights.
• Introduction to Workflow specialism and training
• Can multitask well
• They must have good verbal and written communication skills.
• The candidates should be team players
• Place a high value on developing a career in research.
• Candidates must be able to work under pressure and thrive in a deadline driven environment
• Must be self motivated and self reliant - able to work alone if required
• Must have outgoing personalities and enjoy daily contact with a wide variety of people
• Must be quick thinking, decisive and self confident
• Have a mature work ethic
• Working knowledge of Microsoft application used in the business

Qualifications
• Graduate/Post Graduate in any discipline
• Minimum 3 years experience in secondary research
• Need to pass spot check/assessment with certain level
• Be flexible in working hours/shifts in order to meet the changing demands and requirements of the business

jobs_results.title: information security analyst - iso 27001 - iso 9001
jobs_results.description:
job description
Exposure to clients across various industries
Permanent role with established MNC
About the company
Our client is one of the market leading certification services company here in Singapore. With massive expansion plan in Asia, they are looking to recruit an IT Audit and Information Security Lead, External (ISO 27001, ISO 9001) to join their team.
About the job
Your responsibility includes:
• Planning and conducting IT audit reviews to evaluate the adequacy and effectiveness of IT controls. This includes reviewing of IT functions and key tasks (including Applications, Operating Systems, Databases, Networks, Infrastructure controls and security).
• Preparing audit work papers recording and summarizing data pertinent to assigned audits
• Validating and tracking audit issue remediation to ensure control issues are effectively resolved
• Identifying and recommend opportunities to increase efficiency and effectiveness of operations.
• Conducting training to business users in... IT internal audit techniques, organizational issues, and departmental procedures and protocols.
• Ensuring compliance of IT controls and Information Security policies

Skills and experience required
As a successful applicant, you will have at least 5 years of experience in IT Audit where you are familiar with best practices in IT audit methodologies and internal auditing standards. Exposure to ISO 27001 or ISO 9001 is required for this role.
Candidates from certification services company background will be highly preferred.
Whats on offer
This is an excellent opportunity scale up IT audit and Information Security capabilities for clients across various industry.
To apply online please use the apply function, alternatively you may contact Hoon Teck TAN at 6510 3633. (EA: 94C3609/ R1219669)
skills
it audit, iso 27001, ISO 9001
qualification
no additional qualifications required
educational requirements
Associate Degree/Diploma
